All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssetDirectory
An asset manager that uses a JSON file to define its assets.
AssetDirectory.Index
This class represents the top level index of an asset directory.
AssetParser<T>
This interface parses an asset of type T from a JsonValue.
AudioEngine
This interface provides an audio controller with more functionality than Audio.
AudioSource
This class is an audio asset that is not explicitly attached to an audio engine.
AudioSourceLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load AudioSource assets.
AudioSourceLoader.AudioSourceParameters
The definable parameters for an AudioSource.
AudioStream
This class represents a streaming decoder for an audio asset.
BoxObstacle
Box-shaped model to support collisions.
Bubblegum
Class to represent a "stuck" Bubblegum.
BubblegumController
Controls Bubblegum objects on the screen.
CapsuleObstacle
Box-shaped model to support collisions.
CapsuleObstacle.Orientation
Enum to specify the capsule orientiation
CollisionController
 
Controllers
This class is a safe wrapper for the LibGDX Controllers class The existing Controllers class has been known to segfault on some systems due to the native libraries that it uses.
DesktopLauncher
The main class of the game.
DirectoryLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load AssetDirectory.Index assets.
DirectoryLoader.DirectoryLoaderParameters
The definable parameters for a AssetDirectory.Index.
DudeModel
Player avatar for the plaform game.
EffectFactory
This is a factory class for creating EffectFilter Objects The following openAL effects are supported, for more details on effect parameters, see openAL AL_EFFECT_REVERB AL_EFFECT_CHORUS AL_EFFECT_DISTORTION AL_EFFECT_ECHO AL_EFFECT_FLANGER AL_EFFECT_FREQUENCY_SHIFTER AL_EFFECT_VOCAL_MORPHER AL_EFFECT_PITCH_SHIFTER AL_EFFECT_RING_MODULATOR AL_EFFECT_AUTOWAH AL_EFFECT_EQUALIZER AL_EFFECT_EAXREVERB
EffectFactory.AutoWAHDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a AutoWAH object The Auto-wah effect emulates the sound of a wah-wah pedal used with an electric guitar, or a mute on a brass instrument.
EffectFactory.ChorusDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a chorus effect filter object The chorus effect essentially replays the input audio accompanied by another slightly delayed version of the signal, creating a ‘doubling’ effect.
EffectFactory.DistortionDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a distortion object The distortion effect simulates turning up (overdriving) the gain stage on a guitar amplifier or adding a distortion pedal to an instrument’s output.
EffectFactory.EAXReverbDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a EAXReverb object EAXReverb is a superset of the standard reverb effect with additional control over the reverb tone, reverb directivity, and reverb granularity.
EffectFactory.EchoDef
This class contains definitions for constructing an echo object The echo effect generates discrete, delayed instances of the input signal.
EffectFactory.EqualizerDef
This class contains definitions for constructing an Equalizer object The OpenAL Effects Extension EQ is very flexible, providing tonal control over four different adjustable frequency ranges.
EffectFactory.FlangerDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a flanger object The flanger effect creates a “tearing” or “whooshing” sound (like a jet flying overhead).
EffectFactory.FreqShiftDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a FrequencyShifter object The frequency shifter is a single-sideband modulator, which translates all the component frequencies of the input signal by an equal amount.
EffectFactory.PitchShifterDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a Pitch Shifter object The pitch shifter applies time-invariant pitch shifting to the input signal, over a one octave range and controllable at a semi-tone and cent resolution.
EffectFactory.ReverbDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a reverberation sound effect Reverb lets you transport a listener to a concert hall, a cave, a cathedral, or an intimate performance space.
EffectFactory.RingModDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a Ring Modulator object The ring modulator multiplies an input signal by a carrier signal in the time domain, resulting in tremolo or inharmonic effects.
EffectFactory.VocalMorpherDef
This class contains definitions for constructing a VocalMorpher object The vocal morpher consists of a pair of 4-band formant filters, used to impose vocal tract effects upon the input signal.
EffectFilter
This class represents external sound effects in OpenAL, they can be applied to a sound or music instance to generate additional effects.
Enemy
Abstract enemy class.
ExitModel
A sensor obstacle representing the end of the level Note that the constructor does very little.
FilmStrip
Texture class providing flipbook animation.
FilmStripLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load FilmStrip assets.
FilmStripLoader.FilmStripParameters
The definable parameters for a FilmStrip.
FilmStripParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a FilmStrip.
FreetypeFontParser
This class parses a JSON entry for TrueType font into a BitmapFont.
GameCanvas
Primary view class for the game, abstracting the basic graphics calls.
GameCanvas.BlendState
Enumeration of supported BlendStates.
GameCanvas.DrawPass
Enumeration to track which pass we are in
GameController
Gameplay controller for the game.
GDXRoot
Root class for a LibGDX.
GumJointPair
Represents a tuple of a Bubblegum object and the joint it created when it collided with a body.
InputController
Class for reading player input.
JsonValueLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load JsonValue assets.
JsonValueLoader.JsonValueParameters
The definable parameters for a JsonValue.
JsonValueParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a JsonValue.
LevelModel
Represents a single level in our game
LoadingMode
Class that provides a loading screen for the state of the game.
MovingEnemy
 
MovingEnemy.EnemyState
 
MusicLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load Music assets.
MusicLoader.MusicParameters
The definable parameters for a Music object.
MusicParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a Music.
MusicQueue
This interface represents a continuous audio stream.
MusicQueue.OnTransitionListener
The interface for a callback invoked as the music queue is processed.
MusicQueueLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load SoundEffect assets.
MusicQueueLoader.MusicQueueParameters
The definable parameters for a SoundEffect.
MusicQueueParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a MusicQueue.
Obstacle
Base model class to support collisions.
ParserUtils
This class is a collection of static functions to access data in a JSON file.
PlatformModel
A polygon shape representing the screen boundary Note that the constructor does very little.
PolygonObstacle
Arbitrary polygonal-shaped model to support collisions.
PooledList<E>
A doubly-linked list that uses LibGDX memory pools to optimize memory costs.
RandomController
Static class for producing random numbers.
ResourceManager
This class provides a singleton for managing heavyweight resources This class is heavily based on asset manager.
ScreenListener
A listener class for responding to a screen's request to exit.
Sensor
 
SimpleObstacle
Base model class to support collisions.
SliderGui
 
SoundEffect
This interface represents playback for an in-memory audio asset.
SoundEffect.OnCompletionListener
The interface for a callback invoked as a sound instance is completed This callback is essentially the same asMusic.OnCompletionListener.
SoundEffectLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load SoundEffect assets.
SoundEffectLoader.SoundEffectParameters
The definable parameters for a SoundEffect.
SoundEffectParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a SoundEffect.
SoundLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load Sound assets.
SoundLoader.SoundParameters
The definable parameters for a Sound object.
SoundParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a Sound object.
StationaryEnemy
 
TextureParser
This class parses a JSON entry into a Texture.
TextureRegionLoader
This class is an AssetLoader to load TextureRegion assets.
TextureRegionLoader.TextureRegionParameters
The definable parameters for a TextureRegion.
TextureRegionParser
 
Vision
Fields of vision for enemies
WallModel
A polygon shape representing the screen boundary Note that the constructor does very little.
WheelObstacle
Circle-shaped model to support collisions.
XBoxController
Class to support an XBox (360/One) controller This is a wrapper class, which wraps around a Controller object to provide concrete mappings for the buttons, joysticks and triggers.
XBoxController.Direction
This enumerations supports D-pad directional controls.
